title: Boutique Luxury on Hollywood's Sunset Boulevard
description: Experience glam Hollywood luxe at Grafton on Sunset, a boutique hotel in the heart of West Hollywood. Embodying the edgy, urban sophistication of the famed Sunset Strip,  you’ll find unique guest rooms with an industrial chic finish. Enjoy a daily continental breakfast at the on-site restaurant, plus all amenity fees included, entitling you to free Wi-Fi, in-room bottled water and use of the fitness centre and pool, a welcome cocktail and US$10 daily food and beverage credit.

title: Boutique West Hollywood Suite Luxury with Daily 'Vino & Vinyl' Wine Hour
description: Experience LA’s playground for the rich and famous in the most glamorous of locations, tucked away down a tree-lined street and nestled between Beverly Hills and West Hollywood. Get a taste of high-end Hollywood with a four or six-night escape at the all-suite Montrose West Hollywood with daily breakfast, nightly free-flow Vino and Vinyl hour for two and an included amenity fee which gives you access to the 24-hour fitness centre, daily-replenished water bottles and more. Travelling with children? Upgrade to a VIP or Hollywood package and two children aged 17 years and under stay free.
offer_address: 900 Hammond St, West Hollywood, CA 90069, USA
